titleStmt.title: A proclamation for pardon to them of Tyndale and Riddesdale
Proclamations. 1560-11-04
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles chvrchyarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation setting conditions of pardon for individuals in Tyndale and Riddesdale.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
